title: PROJECT: Yi Voice bug
body: I was playing PROJECT: Yi with my sound at medium and I could barely hear his voice or his quotes when you click around the map with him, I don't know if this was something wrong with my end but I heard other champions just fine. I know this bug doesn't affect gameplay at all but it's something I'd like to bring up.

replies.body: The only thing a Yi ever says is "WTF I was in Alpha!"
I've had this same issue. It doesn't happen all the time, but every so often one of PROJECT: Yi's VO lines comes out a lot quieter than intended. I assume it's a bug

Hey Im Challenger,

Would you mind taking a screenshot of your sound settings real quick? 

We did make the sound a bit higher several patches ago (closer to his release), but if it's still too quiet, we can take another look at it.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=A0TV6gPH,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-01-25T17:48:45.321+0000)
>
> Hey Im Challenger,
> 
> Would you mind taking a screenshot of your sound settings real quick? 
> 
> We did make the sound a bit higher several patches ago (closer to his release), but if it's still too quiet, we can take another look at it.

http://i.imgur.com/pzPo7LH.png?1 I don't know if this is what you want but I played another game with PROJECT: Yi around that sound in game and it was very quiet again compared to other champions

Ah, sorry. I meant a screenshot of your sound settings tab when you're in game. I don't need it anymore. :P 

 I've spoken with the audio bros who worked on PROJECT: Yi and they're checking out the audio and what they can do to turn it up and make it easier to hear in game.
